title: Product Designer
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Join Us as a Product Designer and Shape Extraordinary User Experiences!
Are you a creative visionary with a passion for crafting exceptional user journeys? Do you thrive on collaborating with dynamic teams to bring innovative concepts to life? Look no further – NICE is seeking a talented and experienced Product Designer to join our ranks and play a pivotal role in revolutionizing user experiences across our cutting-edge products.
Why NICE?At NICE, we're not just creating products – we're crafting experiences that delight and empower users. As a Product Designer, you'll have the unique opportunity to leave your mark on every phase of product development, from concept to launch. Join a team of driven individuals who are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of design and technology, and be part of a company that values creativity, innovation, and collaboration.
 
Your Role:As a Product Designer at NICE, you will be at the forefront of user-centric design, working in tandem with product managers, engineers, and users to shape the next generation of our products. Your creative flair will shine as you translate business requirements and user stories into intuitive, engaging interactive experiences. Your role will encompass:
 
Design Mastery: You will own the end-to-end design process, from brainstorming innovative product ideas to refining pixel-perfect details just before launch.
User-Centric Innovation: Dive deep into user needs, behaviors, and preferences through research and interviews. Our 'Pro' users are internal, granting you direct access to invaluable insights.
End-to-End Ownership: Lead the design of features from conception to completion. Transform research insights into ingenious ideas, design workflows, and intricate interactions that drive the evolution of our products.
Usability Wizardry: Employ your expertise in UX methodologies to facilitate Usability Testing and ensure our designs meet and exceed user expectations.
Design Elegance: Contribute to the creation of our product design style guide, ensuring consistency and elegance across all user touchpoints.
 
Your Skills & Background:To thrive in this role, you'll need:
Agile Champion: Experience working in agile, multidisciplinary teams and delivering impactful results within tight timelines.
Communication Virtuoso: Strong English-language communication skills, both oral and written, to effectively convey your ideas and collaborate with diverse teams.
UX Visionary: A minimum of 7 years' experience leading UX design within Complex B2B/B2E product environments, showcasing your unwavering passion for exceptional user experiences.
Design Wizardry: Proficiency in standard UX/UI software, enabling you to create stunning, user-centric designs.
Project Juggler: Master the art of balancing multiple projects, collaborating seamlessly across functions, and exploring diverse design options.
Enterprise Expertise: Familiarity with Large Scale and Enterprise solutions, allowing you to elevate our products to the highest standards.About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
